section.name: Issue Tracking
section.p:
Go to
JTidy SourceForge bug and feature request tracker
to see open bugs or to submit new requests.
Please always attach a valid test case if you find a wrong behaviour in JTidy. If possible try to isolate the problem and create a small file with only the tags causing the problem.
If you want to help us supplying a patch for a known bug attach the patch (cvs diff) to the bug in the sourceforge tracker.

section.name: Fing a bug
section.p: Use this form if you want to find a bug for tidy/jtidy given the tracker number. The tracker number is also the name of the method in junit tests, so you can easily find what is working and what is not in jtidy.
